TopicTitle: KSP at PAX Prime this weekend

Articles.Content:
Any fellow Kerbalnauts going to PAX Prime at all this weekend? I'm going to be attending sunday and monday (figures I would miss the friday activities).

Let me know and we can grab a beer or something!
What I'd like to know is how much they're streaming. I cannot go and I don't want to miss the .22 preview.
I'll be there on Sunday. All the Kerbal-related events are on other days, aren't they?

I live less then an hour away and didn't get tickets!!! Can't tell you how much I regret it.

Hal9000

I live less then an hour away and didn't get tickets!!! Can't tell you how much I regret it.

Hal9000

Don't feel bad. Those tickets sold out so quickly. I'm just lucky that I had a friend who had some extra tickets available. I work in the gaming industry and I missed the ticket sale window.
They can't make it 64 bit if Unity isn't.

They can't make it 64 bit if Unity isn't.

Unity is 64bit.. It is just some kind of bug or something that prevents 64bit version from working on windows. From what I have heard the 64bit version on linux seems to work fine.

Unity is 64bit.. It is just some kind of bug or something that prevents 64bit version from working on windows. From what I have heard the 64bit version on linux seems to work fine.

The actual Unity editor is in fact a 32-bit binary, but it's perfectly capable of building a 64-bit executable of your project. As said by others though, there are various issues with the 64-bit builds of KSP on some platforms.
It didn't say when the .22 preview was, but I'm pretty sure it was yesterday. The tournament is in 3 hours though.

It didn't say when the .22 preview was, but I'm pretty sure it was yesterday. The tournament is in 3 hours though.

As in, what time?
That would put you maybe Federal Way-Tacoma or Everett?
It's at 6 PM Pacific Time. Hour and a half.
